name: Healthyfied Balsamic Cabbage  Slaw
description: Dive into a healthful journey with our Healthyfied Balsamic Cabbage Slaw, perfectly curated for those who follow a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. This recipe brings a new twist to healthy eating, making it an ideal addition to your collection of Healthy Recipes and Healthified Recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the green cabbage, dice the red onion, and thaw the corn if using frozen.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced cabbage, diced onion, and corn.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the coconut balsamic vinegar over the cabbage mixture and toss everything together until well coated. Let it sit for 5 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the slaw as a refreshing side dish to your favorite meals.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
